oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Chief Skaggs & His Mountain Melody Boys - WCMI - 1937-02-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WCMI, Ashland, KY radio program of Chief Skaggs & His Mountain Melody Boys. Featuring Dolpha 'Chief' Skaggs, the 'Gold Dust Twins' of Curley (likely Curley Collins) and Bob Shortridge, Charlie 'Big Foot' Keaton, and Charlie Wiginton, with announcer Paul Rue (name unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chief Skaggs; Mountain Melody Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Paul Rue) -- Chief Skaggs introduces Charlie Keaton -- Black And Tan Rag -- Chief Skaggs introduces 'The Gold Dust Twins', Curley and Bob -- The Prisoner's Dream -- Chief Skaggs introduces Bob -- Hills Of Old Wyoming -- Chief Skaggs introduces Charlie Wiginton -- Sing, Baby, Sing -- Chief Skaggs introduces 'The Trio' -- Ridin' Home -- Chief Skaggs introduces Curley -- Yodeling Cowboy -- Theme -- Closing statement (Paul Rue)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WCMI (Radio Station: Ashland, Ky.); Skaggs, Dolpha; Mountain Melody Boys (Musical group); Collins, Curley; Shortridge, Bob; Keaton, Charlie Big Foot; Wiginton, Chuck
